item.title: How to make the most of your wardrobe
item.description: Your master bedroom closet is more than just a place to store your clothing. It is the place from which all your amazing outfits are created. There are many ways to organize your closet. Most often you would read that tops should be together, bottoms together, jackets together. It makes sense - right? It makes it easier to choose an outfit when you know all the possible tops you can wear.
